alert.note: Alert for East Feliciana; Pointe Coupee; West Feliciana (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 02 at 2:58PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHERN WEST FELICIANA, NORTHERN POINTE COUPEE AND NORTH CENTRAL EAST FELICIANA PARISHES, WILKINSON AND NORTHWESTERN AMITE COUNTIES THROUGH 400 PM CDT... At 257 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms capable of producing funnel clouds along a line extending from near Garden City to 7 miles south of Fort Adams. Movement was west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...If a funnel cloud briefly touches down, minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Woodville, Gloster, Fort Adams, Dolorosa, Spillman, and Crosby. FUNNEL CLOUDS...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Conditions are favorable for the development of weak, brief funnel clouds. This type of funnel cloud is harmless, but on rare occasions they can briefly touch down, producing wind gusts over 50 mph. If a funnel cloud is spotted move indoors or to safe harbor and report your sighting to the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: East Feliciana; Pointe Coupee; West Feliciana
